1 //Namespace
  2 var EarthServerGenericClient = EarthServerGenericClient || {};
  3 
  4 /**
  5  * @class Scene Model: WCPS Image with DEM from WCS Query
  6  * 2 URLs for the service, 2 Coverage names for the image and dem.
  7  * @augments EarthServerGenericClient.AbstractSceneModel
  8  */
  9 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemWCS = function()
 10 {
 11     this.setDefaults();
 12     this.name = "WCPS Image with DEM from WCS Query.";
 13     /**
 14      * WCS version for the query.
 15      * @default "2.0.0"
 16      * @type {String}
 17      */
 18     this.WCSVersion = "2.0.0";
 19 };
 20 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemWCS.inheritsFrom( EarthServerGenericClient.AbstractSceneModel );
 21 /**
 22  * Sets the url for both the WCPS and WCS Queries.
 23  * @param wcpsurl - Service URL for the WCPS Request
 24  * @param demurl  - Service URL for the WCS Request
 25  */
 26 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemWCS.prototype.setURLs=function(wcpsurl, demurl){
 27     /**
 28      * URL for the WCPS service.
 29      * @type {String}
 30      */
 31     this.URLWCPS = String(wcpsurl);
 32     /**
 33      * URL for the WCS service.
 34      * @type {String}
 35      */
 36     this.URLDEM  = String(demurl);
 37 };
 38 /**
 39  * Sets both coveragenames
 40  * @param coverageImage - Coverage name for the image dataset.
 41  * @param coverageDem   - Coverage name for the dem dataset.
 42  */
 43 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemWCS.prototype.setCoverages = function (coverageImage, coverageDem) {
 44     /**
 45      * Name of the image coverage.
 46      * @type {String}
 47      */
 48     this.coverageImage = String(coverageImage);
 49     /**
 50      * Name if the dem coverage.
 51      * @type {String}
 52      */
 53     this.coverageDEM = String(coverageDem);
 54 };
 55 /**
 56  * Sets a complete custom querystring.
 57  * @param querystring - the querystring. Use $CI (coverageImage), $CD (coverageDEM),
 58  * $MINX,$MINY,$MAXX,$MAXY(AoI) and $RESX,ResZ (Resolution) for automatic replacement.
 59  * Examples: $CI.red , x($MINX:$MINY)
 60  */
 61 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemWCS.prototype.setWCPSQuery = function(querystring)
 62 {
 63     /**
 64      * The custom query.
 65      * @type {String}
 66      */
 67     this.WCPSQuery = String(querystring);
 68 };
 69 
 70 /**
 71  * Sets the WCS Version for the WCS Query String. Default: "2.0.0"
 72  * @param version - String with WCS version number.
 73  */
 74 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemWCS.prototype.setWCSVersion = function(version)
 75 {
 76     this.WCSVersion = String(version);
 77 };
 78 
 79 /**
 80  * Creates the x3d geometry and appends it to the given root node. This is done automatically by the SceneManager.
 81  * @param root - X3D node to append the model.
 82  * @param cubeSizeX - Size of the fishtank/cube on the x-axis.
 83  * @param cubeSizeY - Size of the fishtank/cube on the y-axis.
 84  * @param cubeSizeZ - Size of the fishtank/cube on the z-axis.
 85  * @param index - Index of this model in the SceneManager list.
 86  */
 87 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemWCS.prototype.createModel=function(root, index, cubeSizeX, cubeSizeY, cubeSizeZ){
 88     if( root === undefined)
 89         alert("root is not defined");
 90 
 91     EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogStart("Create Model " + this.name);
 92 
 93     this.cubeSizeX = cubeSizeX;
 94     this.cubeSizeY = cubeSizeY;
 95     this.cubeSizeZ = cubeSizeZ;
 96 
 97     this.root = root;
 98     this.index = index;
 99 
100     //Create Placeholder
101     this.createPlaceHolder();
102 
103     //1: Check if mandatory values are set
104     if( this.coverageImage === undefined || this.coverageDEM === undefined || this.URLWCPS === undefined || this.URLDEM === undefined
105         || this.minx === undefined || this.miny === undefined || this.maxx === undefined || this.maxy === undefined )
106     {
107         alert("Not all mandatory values are set. WCPSDemWCS: " + this.name );
108         console.log(this);
109         return;
110     }
111 
112     //2: create wcps query
113     //If no query was defined use standard query.
114     if( this.WCPSQuery === undefined)
115     {
116         this.WCPSQuery =  "for i in (" + this.coverageImage + "), dtm in (" + this.coverageDEM + ") return encode ( { ";
117         this.WCPSQuery += "red: scale(trim(i.red, {x(" + this.minx + ":" +  this.maxx + "), y(" + this.miny + ":" + this.maxy + ') }), {x:"CRS:1"(0:' + this.XResolution + '), y:"CRS:1"(0:' + this.ZResolution + ")}, {}); ";
118         this.WCPSQuery += "green: scale(trim(i.green, {x(" + this.minx + ":" +  this.maxx + "), y(" + this.miny + ":" + this.maxy + ') }), {x:"CRS:1"(0:' + this.XResolution + '), y:"CRS:1"(0:' + this.ZResolution + ")}, {}); ";
119         this.WCPSQuery += "blue: scale(trim(i.blue, {x(" + this.minx + ":" +  this.maxx + "), y(" + this.miny + ":" + this.maxy + ') }), {x:"CRS:1"(0:' + this.XResolution + '), y:"CRS:1"(0:' + this.ZResolution + ")}, {})";
120         this.WCPSQuery += '}, "' + this.imageFormat +'" )';
121     }
122     else //A custom query was defined so use it
123     {
124         //Replace $ symbols with the actual values
125         this.WCPSQuery = this.WCPSQuery.replace("$CI",this.coverageImage);
126         this.WCPSQuery = this.WCPSQuery.replace("$MINX",this.minx);
127         this.WCPSQuery = this.WCPSQuery.replace("$MINY",this.miny);
128         this.WCPSQuery = this.WCPSQuery.replace("$MAXX",this.maxx);
129         this.WCPSQuery = this.WCPSQuery.replace("$MAXY",this.maxy);
130         this.WCPSQuery = this.WCPSQuery.replace("$RESX",this.XResolution);
131         this.WCPSQuery = this.WCPSQuery.replace("$RESZ",this.ZResolution);
132     }
133 
134     //3: Make ServerRequest and receive data.
135     var bb = {
136         minLongitude: this.miny,
137         maxLongitude: this.maxy,
138         minLatitude:  this.minx,
139         maxLatitude:  this.maxx
140     };
141     EarthServerGenericClient.requestWCPSImageWCSDem(this,this.URLWCPS,this.WCPSQuery,this.URLDEM,this.coverageDEM,bb,this.WCSVersion);
142 };
143 
144 /**
145  * This is a callback method as soon as the ServerRequest in createModel() has received it's data.
146  * This is done automatically.
147  * @param data - Received data from the ServerRequest.
148  */
149 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemWCS.prototype.receiveData= function( data)
150 {
151     if( this.checkReceivedData(data))
152     {
153         //Remove the placeHolder
154         this.removePlaceHolder();
155 
156         var YResolution = (parseFloat(data.maxHMvalue) - parseFloat(data.minHMvalue) );
157         var transform = this.createTransform(data.width,YResolution,data.height,parseFloat(data.minHMvalue));
158         this.root.appendChild( transform);
159 
160         //Set transparency
161         data.transparency = this.transparency;
162         //Create Terrain out of the received data
163         EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogStart("Create Terrain " + this.name);
164         this.terrain = new EarthServerGenericClient.LODTerrain(transform, data, this.index);
165         this.terrain.createTerrain();
166         EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogEnd("Create Terrain " + this.name);
167         EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogEnd("Create Model " + this.name);
168 
169         transform = null;
170     }
171 };
172 
173 
174 /**
175  * Every Scene Model creates it's own specific UI elements. This function is called automatically by the SceneManager.
176  * @param element - The element where to append the specific UI elements for this model.
177  * @param modelNumber - Number of this model in the SceneManager.
178  */
179 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemWCS.prototype.setSpecificElement= function(element,modelNumber)
180 {
181     EarthServerGenericClient.appendElevationSlider(element,modelNumber);
182 };
